Based on the password used.
Example password used is: password



OK SO HERES HOW IT WORKS FR FR:
Take each letter in the password, and the [PASS LENGTH] character in input after that gets replaced by the one in [USER PASS] followed by how many times after it is (1 for 1 pass lengh after, 2 for 2 pass lengths after, etc). Keep replacing until all letters are "encoded". Then replace all letter sin input with the corresponding encoded letter.

Every [passlength] letters in letter portion of encoded message it adds [passlength] random letters
example:
r = real letters f = fake letters
say [passlength] = 7
rrrrrrrfffffffrrrrrrrfffffff-1287361283761276821268217361827618273187

Randomizes the character for every space, however at the end it keeps track of which ones are spaces by saying thier substring locations:
ex 001 003 010 013 018
At the end of the letters portion, adds [PASSLENGTH]x10 random numbers, and after that, the numbers (indexs) of locations that contain a SPACE, then followed by [PASSLENGTH]x10 more random numbers

  Also, all spaces in the encoded message are replaced by a RANDOM LETTER (doesn matter since they will be deleted anyway)
so it would look like 10463729640164820010030100130181745391029365720 and the password determines that 001003010013018 is the correct spaces location.


full encryption example: "HELLO WORLD" encrypted using "PASSWORD":
A1O6O7O7A2Q1P1A2R3X2E4F3C2B2X3N4D2O7W1-55017052406929849020679030530700428746710400023060659830859204000050030631975990128700000012050880736624072066300568881600003007677

It is to be noted that pass length increases linearly with number of characters in input and both linearly and quadraticly with amount of characters in password

It is interesting to be noted that the order of letters in a password does not matter, so "PASSWORD" and "SAPDODRWS" decrypt the same


another example:
ENCODED MESSAGE "HELLO WORLD THIS IS A REALLY COOL MESSAGE THAT DEMONSTRATES THIS ENCRYPTION" INTO:
Z7O1Z4Z4I2D4G1I2Z6Z4N1H5D1Z7C2C1R1C2C1F5E3G4Z6O1E3Z4Z4I1B4M1J3W1G5N3Q4T1L1R2G5U2G2O3O3W5Q5T2S1C1U4Y5E5X5X4F2R3B1L2Q4M1I2I2Z4K3G2O1C1C1E3A2O1L3D1Z7E3D1K5N1O1G2I2Z9C1D1Z6E3D1O1Q2R5X2V5H3W3G4W1M5I4C3B5O4P4M5O3N4V3X4A4O1O3E2R5S4H1Q3G5R3C1C4D1Z7C2C1F2O1Z9M1Z6I1Z1D1C2I2Z9-

using password AMAZINGDEMOENCRYPTIONPASSWORD
